location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Ext 1569/42 'Tours of the Political Agent, Bahrein'

physicalDescription.extent: The papers are arranged in chronological order from the rear to the front of the volume.

Foliation: the foliation sequence (used for referencing) commences at the front cover with 1, and terminates at the inside back cover with 7; these numbers are written in pencil, are circled, and are located in the top right corner of the recto side of each folio.

mods.abstract: The file contains a report by Major Reginald George Alban, Political Agent in Bahrain, describing a tour he undertook of settlements in the Trucial States [United Arab Emirates].
